description:
Please read the entire description before purchasing.&
Powered by the Radio Reference API, Scan Do! gives you access to over 2,000 audio feeds from around the world.  Radio Reference is a collection of distributed scanner streams operated by volunteers.
Retrieve streams by country, state, or county and keep up-to-date with emergency situations in your favorite location.
Set a location to load on application startup, or control the feed list manually, it's EASY with Scan Do!
Scan Do! offers a simple interface for selecting a stream, playing or pausing, and changing your filter criteria, all in one scene!
Not all locations are available.  The streams are provided by regular people from all over the world.  Your audio quality is directly impacted by their bandwidth, CPU, etc, in addition to your phone's Internet connection quality.
